评论详情: Love the durability and storage capacity. It’s waterproof. The straps is comfortable
Too small for my needs. Not versatile enough. Price point a bit high. I sent back.

I do like this backpack with all the pockets its great for my classes and even great for travel. However i wish for it to be a little larger. it did fit all my items but that was it no extra room couldn't add anything to it. I also wish the straps were a little longer because after carrying it around for a while one side of the strap came off. It was easily fix and went about my day. overall i did like using this backpack for what i needed to use it for.

评论概述: Good back pack with lots of room
评论详情: The cables for the headphone and USB port are removable, making it easy to wash. it has lots of room and nice internal pockets. Mine is mounted to the tail seat on my motorcycle where it gets riding gear, pop bottles, and stuff from the store absolutely rammed into it. I have had to sit on it before to get it to close with all the stuff I put in there. that said, the seams/zippers/webbing are all holding up excellent. I am able to fit a small luggage lock through the zippers (theft deterrent). overall this bag is holding up very well for the abuse I'm putting it through.

评论概述: Pretty good vacation backpack, fits a lot of stuff and pockets are useful
评论详情: We just went on a 8 day vacation and I tried out this new backpack. There are lots of useful pockets for things; I'll admit I didn't use all the features (like the charging port), but overall I was impressed with how much it held and kept things organized. For those of you with teens that use Jansport backpacks for school and traveling, you know what I'm talking about.  This isn't just a bottomless pit one-compartment backpack. There are carefully thought out slots for things inside:  -Padded flat area for your laptop (keep in mind that 14" is prob the max size laptop you'd want to bring) -One more flat slot for paperwork and folders (handy for travel documents) -Zipper interior pockets, one of which we used to hide passports securely -Smaller pockets for pens, and other easy-to-lose items -Extra "open area" room for a rolled up jacket or sweatshirt  On the outside, you have some nice features as well including:  -Standard outer pouch zippered pocket where you can put things for easy reach like hand sanitizer and pens -An open flap pocket with magnetic button closure to put things like a cell phone that you want to keep taking in and out of your bag during flight -Water bottle holder (smaller is better, maybe 20 oz max bottle that isn't too tall)  I also appreciated and liked the top handles when you want to carry the backpack with your hands instead of on your back. That part was one of my favorite features. The handles are well made and strong, not like the nylon loop that most school backpacks come with.  As far as the cons, I am taking away 1 star just because it CAN be a little uncomfortable on a long day out. We had a half day of walking around Seattle, each one of us with a backpack on. Walking around with a full backpack showed that the backpack straps and overall comfort were not designed for this kind of use. Hiking backpacks and sport backpacks have curved straps for better fit over your shoulders and back. This backpack just has straight straps from top to bottom. It eventually caught up to me and was not comfortable. Again, this is after walking around for 30 minutes with a fairly heavy load. Normally we wouldn't be doing this kind of walking with backpacks on, but we had 6 hours to kill after a cruise and had already checked our luggage with the airline.  Finally, I wasn't thrilled with the gold hardware on the baby blue color, but I think it did make it a little unique since you don't see that every day. All the hardware is in the gold so it's a little overwhelming when you first look at it. I would have preferred brushed stainless steel or graphite gray hardware on the baby blue backpack.

评论概述: Not really made for carrying laptop plus several travel items
评论详情: Looks -  It’s not unattractive but it is really more for people looking for a functional backpack than its looks.  The gold zippers give it a little more elegant look but that’s about as far as attractiveness as I see it.Functionality - There truly is a lot going on with this backpack. The front compartment has an interior open pocket and a built-in retractable keychain.  That is a great design.  As for the side pockets - one side is for large water bottle while the other side it’s designed to place a small tissue box in or napkins that has an opening for easy access. There’s also access to USB and headphone jacks on left side of backpack, which is a good design but are not for fast charging and most people now do bluetooth phone connection.  The main compartment also has many inside pockets and 1 with mesh pocket with zipper.  The back compartment also has enough pocket to put in a laptop and large tablet.  The padding, however, seems to be pretty thin, especially on the bottom and in between the laptop and tablet.  The straps are also fairly thin and not well padded.  Realistically, the bag itself is already fairly hefty.  When the backpack is fully loaded with a lightweight plastic water bottle that is half full, a laptop, laptop power adapter, a set of clothes and some toiletries, the bag is super heavy; but the most concerning part is if it will hold up in the long haul.  I think it might be better off to be used as a light carry backpack without heavy electronics around town instead of a travel backpack as I had hoped.Overall - 3/5 stars; if there was more padding on the bottom and had better support in key areas, it would have a higher rating.
Love the space it gives

This backpack gives you all the space and organization of a regular backpack, but with the look and feel of a purse. The canvas material and brown trim look quite fashionable, and the straps are nice and comfortable. It has plenty of space inside for a laptop and books, and also includes space for a portable battery charger. I used this as my carry-on bag for a weekend work trip, and it worked very well keeping both my clothes and work materials organized. It seems like it was made very well, so I'm hoping it will last me for many more trips to come!
Great backpack. Well constructed and holds quite a bit.

Canvas type material should be travel resistant (rough handling) Several pouches in front Key ring (tied to a bungee type cord) Pouch on back for books or iPad 2 Zipper pouches and open pouches in main compartment USB charger with cord Computer pouch and small pouch Luggage strap Backpack straps

I use this bag both for travelling with my laptop for work or for bringing stuff between my offices. It's very handy and fits my 15" laptop quite well alongside some notebooks and my charging cord. It's stylish and simple and quite comfortable to wear.

评论概述: I love the amount of pockets
评论详情: I replaced this with another backpack I had from a few years ago and instantly I could see this is much higher quality. It’s not overly big/bulky but it’s also not too small. I use this daily for work as it looks very professional and I appreciate the generous amount of pockets and how this helps me easily keep my backpack organized. I highly recommend and feel this is also very giftable too.

This backpack has a lot of pockets, big and little. It also has a way to connect a portable charger to a phone or mp3 player as well as head phones. This would be good for college students are maybe high schoolers that don't have to carry as many books as we did in the 90's. So far, I have no issues with seams or straps being weak, ripping or breaking. The color is neutral, but it is a bit light for my taste as every spot shows up on it. Overall it is a decent backpack.

评论概述: Excellent backpack for travel and transporting my laptop!
评论详情: This JEEHAN 15.6 Inch Laptop Travel Backpack/Purse for Women is an excellent product. The design is very roomy and well thought out with many convenient compartments and pockets. The design of the interior of the backpack allows me to fit both my laptop and my tablet and all of their accompanying "necessities". Big Bonus are the built-in charging and ear bud connections - nice!. The backpack is well padded and very comfortable to carry.  Additionally, there is a wide strap on the back that is designed to slide directly over the handle to my carry-on luggage. This keeps it securely attached and upright - perfect for traveling.

评论概述: Great backpack with plenty of room
评论详情: This backpack is a really good size. It can hold a laptop, iPad, and some paperwork in the larger section of the bag and still has plenty of room for other items in the other sections. The material on the outside has a soft leather feel. Although, the one I received did have some sticky stuff on several areas of the bag. Almost like there had been a sticker on a few different places. I’m still trying to get the stickiness off. The straps are nicely padded and comfortable. The backpack came with the cords to connect an extra charging bank and also headphones from inside the bag to the connection outside the bag. The side pockets work perfectly for my laptop charger and a bottle of water.  Damon M. Tatem

I had reasonably low expectations for this backpack given how inexpensive it is - but I was blown away by just how nice it is! All the materials are top quality, and it's clear this bag is made well. There are pockets galore both inside and out, with lots and lots of different storage options. There are dedicated pouches for a laptop and a tablet, as well as a completely separate pocket large enough to carry several thick textbooks. This layout makes this bag perfect for a college student.  We picked this bag up for our daughter who is a new college student, and expect it will hold up very well to the abuse that students can dish out.  The pass-through feature of a USB plug and a microphone jack means she can keep a small power bank in the laptop to be able to easily charge her phone on the go. The shoulder straps are thick and well-padded and feature a lot of adjustability, which will make this pack very comfortable to wear.  Everything about this bag is premium, except the price.

This pack will find a multitude of uses. It's very well-made with all-metal hardware and strong stitching. It's stylish, lined throughout with a nifty striped fabric. The contrasting gold-colored hardware adds a glamorous touch. It has many pockets; I will probably lose things in it there are so many, but there's a place for everything. The straps are decently padded. The "beige" fabric is really a cream color but is slick enough that most soil will likely wipe away easily. I hove the fact that it has (sturdy!) top carry handles and a webbing band on the back so that it can be slid over the handle of your rolling suitcase. I find the "napkin" (probably tissue) pocket to be a useless affectation, but others might find it useful. The water bottle pocket will fit taller and slimmer bottles but not the common wider bottles; I'd estimate 3-3.5" as its maximum diameter.  Still, a very well-made and useful pack that is more grown-up and elegant than an ordinary backpack.

This backpack has a lot of room for storage. Lots of compartments for your electronics and office stuff. I really appreciate having two external pockets for water bottles with stretchy openings. My only complaint is that I was expecting this to be lightweight, it is not, unfortunately. Other than that, it is a well constructed backpack.
This is a very stylish backpack and can even be used as a purse.

If you're looking for the perfect bookbag look no further. Bag is the perfect size, ultra lightweight and designed beautifully. The design is well thought out and it has a compartment in all the most ideal/convenient spots including a slot in the back with a zipper- goes against your back so it's even more secure. Has a compartment on the front and two larger in the middle section plus a spot for a tablet/laptop possibly. Would perfect in there. Side has two sections for bottles plus it has a cord for charging devices. The pack is incredibly comfortable and the straps are nicely cushioned. It's the ideal size. To me a must buy and near perfect. Highly recommended.

评论概述: Classy, Sturdy, and Functional at a GREAT Price
评论详情: I honestly want sure if I would like this backpack or not. I was looking for something a bit less “utilitarian” than the normal backpack I use on a daily basis. During the winter I work in a mountain resort ED/Urgent Care facility. I used a regular Burton backpack for that because it gets placed on the ground under the registration des and often encounters mud, ice, water, and sometimes even bodily fluids. Now that I’m working in a family practice setting I didn’t need something as tough. I wanted something classier and more suited for a professional office setting. Yes, I’m a bit worried about the color and the bag getting dirty. But I let my dog paw it after going on a walk on mountain trails. I used a baby wipe and the dirt came off easily and you can’t tell it was dirty.  It also seems a little small but as you can see from the photos, it fits absolutely everything I need. I included a photo of my lunch bento which is NOT small. It fits perfectly. A 24 ounce water bottle also fits in the pocket next to my bento. I was too lazy to run down to my car to get it though. The front zipper pocket holds my inhaler, keys, 4 tubes of lip gloss/balm, two pens and a small tube of lotion.  My 15” laptop fits nicely in the back padded pocket. I can fit everything I need on a daily basis in this backpack. I haven’t used the charger yet but I’ll try it out tomorrow and update my review. I posted a photo of the bag full, and zipped up. Doesn’t look packed to the gills and as if the zipper is about to burst. The straps are comfortable too.  While I haven’t had the bag long enough to attest to its long-term durability, I’ll update this review when some time has passed.
Very useful bag and I can put everything I need for work is there, great quality and material, great product and reasonable price. Great for travel too.

A gorgeous little backpack, I love the fabric and color- it is easy to keep clean and looks sleek. I was surprised with how many pockets are in this bag! It really makes organizing so much easier! There is literally a place for everything! It comes with a port for headphones and a USB cord- perfect to use with a power bank so you will always be prepared! My Surface laptop fits snuggly inside the inner pocket along with all of my books. A regular sized water bottle will easily fit in the side pocket and the other side pocket has a slot opening for, I am guessing tissues, although I don't think I would use it for that. The back straps are a little thin, but strong enough and I have had no issues with them. I am impressed with the design and how well this was made.

It’s not only well made, it’s roomy, yet proportioned well. It has a place for everything, keeping delicate items safe. One of my most favorite features is the light interior. It truly helps to find things fast and easy. I am very pleased with this. This will last me a very long time.

This is a solidly-built backpack that is going to hold up. Lots of pockets for everything you need- including the pockets inside so I can put a water bottle in my backpack! Yay!! The design of this backpack makes it a good choice for so many different tasks- it has pockets in the right place and other details (the tissue holder on the outside for when you've got a cold!) that make it super-versatile. Very happy with this and highly recommend!
Perfect to grab for on the go, if you a chaperone for a trip or traveling this holds all you need.  I would recommend as a gift to any teacher or nurse.

评论概述: Perfect number of pockets and compartments
评论详情: This is the perfect bag to pack your gear and one night's change of clothes.  You can fit quite a bit of stuff in here.  I recently had to visit/stay with someone in the hospital and I wished I'd had this bag during that time.I was able to fit my two pairs of glasses, IPad, 3ds, a change of clothes, keys, small battery bank, and other incidentals.  The build quality is good, lots of hide-y holes to put your stuff.  The color is mild, but ok.  A great bag for small trips or hanging out.

评论概述: A bit too small for 15.6 in laptop but a good bag otherwise.
评论详情: Watch the video for the full review.  It's a pretty good bag for a 14-in laptop They definitely did a lot of nice little things including some good protection for your laptop in general.  If you like this color and you like this type of material especially if you like to bring a lot of drinks with you cuz there's four places to hold drinks then I would recommend this bag.

I absolutely love this backpack as it has everything you need to pack your laptop with USB and is the right size.  The hidden and the zippered pockets give plenty of space . Extremely well made. Being waterproof is a plus if you happen to get it wet on a rainy day. Definitely priced right.
This backpack is unique, my wife loved it and the USB charger that is included on the side.

This backpack is plenty big but not bulky. Loads of interior room. Lots of pockets and zippers to hold anything and everything. The connections for electronics are firmly attached and provide easy access for listening to whatever I'm in the mood for. Very nicely constructed.

评论概述: Perfect personal item for airline travel.  Here is why ...
评论详情: Airlines usually allow a carryon and personal item such as a handbag. My wife just got this Jeehan backpack which is smaller than my backpack/briefcase which classifies as a personal item when flying. She can fit a number of things in conveniently and have them readily accessible when needed. For example, there is a hidden zippered compartment on the back right under the shoulder carrying straps where she can put her passport, boarding pass, and wallet for safekeeping. Pickpockets can't get to it while it is strapped to her back, and it will be readily accessible as she goes through security and customs.  She loves her tablet and there is a compartment for that and for a laptop should she ever decide to buy one. They too are in quickly accessible compartments so they can be quickly removed when going through the x-ray machines at the security and TSA stations. Other compartments are also provided that make it easy to quickly get hold of items like a take on snack, notebook, medications, pens, and other items.  A very nice feature is the built in ports with wires connections. You can attach a music player on the inside jack to allow for an earphone or headphone to plug into an audio jack. Likewise, you can attach a battery pack on the inside of the bag to a USB port which then lets you recharge your phone or other device externally from outside the bag. This can be really handy and convenient.
Fit my 15” laptop, iPad, notebook, phone , pens, umbrella and still had room! So many pockets! Love this bag.
